channel.title: Twitter
channel.description:
Before i get started, i saw the "please don't ask for help here." Sadly there is no other thread for my question.. so this is the best i guess?...
Well, i'ma try to explain this. :))
I'm following a celebrity. And i want to tweet something to them. So, i go to their Twitter page, and click the Tool button thing. And click "[B]@ Mention *celebrity name*[/B]"
Then it takes me to my Home page, and on the top there is the paragraph thing that says "[B]Reply to *celebrity name*:[/B]"
So i type what i want, and send it.
It comes up on my Twitter page, but not theirs? I've tried so many times, and i cannot get my Tweet to their page. Please help.
Am i clicking something wrong?

uhh… k?.. Thanks for that tip?

item.title: Twitter
item.dc:creator: @Preist Preist
item.description:
@Preist wrote:

Before i get started, i saw the “please don’t ask for help here.”
Sadly there is no other thread for my question… so this is the best i guess?..

Well, i’ma try to explain this. :))

I’m following a celebrity. And i want to tweet something to them. So, i go to their Twitter page, and click the Tool button thing. And click “@ Mention celebrity name”

Then it takes me to my Home page, and on the top there is the paragraph thing that says “Reply to celebrity name:”

So i type what i want, and send it.

It comes up on my Twitter page, but not theirs? I’ve tried so many times, and i cannot get my Tweet to their page. Please help.

Am i clicking something wrong?

Read full topic
